description: [HUI Loader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1097) has the ability to disable Windows Event Tracing for Windows (ETW) and Antimalware Scan Interface (AMSI) functions.(Citation: SecureWorks BRONZE STARLIGHT Ransomware Operations June 2022)

external_references.description: Counter Threat Unit Research Team . (2022, June 23). BRONZE STARLIGHT RANSOMWARE OPERATIONS USE HUI LOADER. Retrieved December 7, 2023.
external_references.source_name: SecureWorks BRONZE STARLIGHT Ransomware Operations June 2022
